entry.RedBlue: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.
entry.Yellow: The center section is named the core. People think it is communicating when it glows in 7 colors.
entry.Gold: The center section of its body is called the core. It glows in a different color each time it is seen.
entry.Silver: Regardless of the environment it lives in, its body grows to form a symmetrical geometric shape.
entry.Crystal: It is said that it uses the seven-colored core of its body to send electric waves into outer space.
entry.Ruby: STARMIE’s center section - the core - glows brightly in seven colors. Because of its luminous nature, this POKéMON has been given the nickname “the gem of the sea.”
entry.Sapphire: STARMIE swims through water by spinning its star-shaped body as if it were a propeller on a ship. The core at the center of this POKéMON’s body glows in seven colors.
entry.FireRed: This POKéMON has a geometric body. Because of its body, the locals suspect that it is an alien creature.
entry.LeafGreen: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.
entry.Emerald: People in ancient times imagined that STARMIE were transformed from the reflections of stars that twinkled on gentle waves at night.
entry.DiamondPearlPlatinum: At the center of its body is a red core, which sends mysterious radio signals into the night sky.
entry.HeartGold: The middle section of its body is called the core. It glows in a different color each time it is seen.
entry.SoulSilver: Regardless of the environment it lives in, its body grows to form a symmetrical geometric shape.
entry.BlackWhite: At the center of its body is a red core, which sends mysterious radio signals into the night sky.
entry.Black 2White 2: Its core shines in many colors and sends radio signals into space to communicate with something.
entry.X: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.
entry.Y: At the center of its body is a red core, which sends mysterious radio signals into the night sky.
entry.Omega Ruby: Starmie’s center section—the core—glows brightly in seven colors. Because of its luminous nature, this Pokémon has been given the nickname “the gem of the sea.”
entry.Alpha Sapphire: Starmie swims through water by spinning its star-shaped body as if it were a propeller on a ship. The core at the center of this Pokémon’s body glows in seven colors.
entry.Sun: Its shining core is thought to receive and transmit enigmatic signals. It has been known to cause headaches in those who approach it.
entry.Moon: Its unusual body shape, reminiscent of abstract art, led local people to spread rumors that this Pokémon may be an invader from outer space.
